officialTitle: Impact of Intrathecal Morphine on Sleep Apnea Syndrome After Hip Arthroplasty Performed Under Spinal Anaesthesia
inclusionCriteria:
* physical status I - III
* patients scheduled to undergo hip arthroplasty
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 99 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* planned surgical duration more than 3 hours
* contraindication to spinal anaesthesia
* severe respiratory disease
* patient known and treated for sleep apnea syndrome
